about_the_game: Immerse yourself in the hauntingly beautiful world of Forgotten Spirit with the official soundtrack, now available on Steam as a downloadable content pack. This sound collection isn't just background music; it's a deep dive into the heart of Forgotten Spirit. The 14-minute, 25-second soundtrack features 5 original tracks, carefully selected to enhance your experience of the game's unforgiving world.
